HELP_PAGE.TITLE: Settings & Help
HELP_PAGE.CONTENT:
The app has been tested with:

  • Google Chrome for Android and iOS
  • Firefox for Android and iOS
  • Desktop-Versions of Chrome and Firefox
There is no guarantee that it works on other Browsers! If you tested it on any other browser and encounter problems, let me know: moin@frot.io

ADD_TO_HOMESCREEN.TITLE: Add to homescreen
ADD_TO_HOMESCREEN.CONTENT: You should see an 'Add to Homescreen' Notification at the bottom on mobile browsers (Chrome & Firefox). By clicking 'Yes', the App gets downloaded and then also works offline!

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Push-Notifications
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS.CONTENT:
On the first startup, a dialog box at the bottom asks you for enabling push-notifications. If you accidentally clicked 'Deny', you can re-enable them with:

  1. If you use a browser: Click on the lock left of the URL and set 'Notification' to 'Ask'.
  2. If you installed the app: Go to the app settings of your Operating System (Android or iOS) and re-enable Notifications.
  3. Click the button below.

LANGUAGE_SELECT.TITLE: Language
LANGUAGE_SELECT.CONTENT: You can switch the language with the buttons below. Here you can read, why labels instead of country flags are used on the buttons.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: Feedback
FEEDBACK.CONTENT:
For Bugs, Feature-requests or praise, write me an Email: moin@frot.io

Please do not forget to include your Operating System (Android, MacOS, Windows, iOS...) and the Browser you are using.
